name: The Ninja Way
description:
The Ninja Way is a classic platformer where you do all the usual stuff like jumping, running and dashing. Except, you can only do one at once! Apart from walking, your mobility is limited to only 1 ability. Sometimes overcoming obstacles would require ninja like precision, by changing your abilities in quick succession. If you are reading for the challenge, come and learn the Ninja Way!

Controls: 

Move your character with the left and right arrow.

Change your abilities by pressing the buttons 1, 2 and 3, Jumping, Dashing and Running respectively.

Use your ability by pressing Space.

To pause the level press Escape.

The team:

All textures, including animation, were done by Chuckuddin, definitely follow him on twitch! https://www.twitch.tv/chuckuddin

Due to the time limitations, the controls aren't that well explained in the game itself, but it's still recommended you check it.
